text: Friedrich "Fritz" Pfeffer (1889—1944) was a German-born Jewish dentist who hid with Anne Frank in Amsterdam during the Holocaust (1941—1945). According to camp records, he died on 20 December 1944 in Neugamme (outside of Hamburg). ==Life== Pfeffer was born Friedrich "Fritz" Pfeffer on 30 April 1889. title: Fritz Pfeffer
